embed_channel: Which channel should the embed be sent in?
embed_colour: Please provide the colour in hex format (e.g. `#123456`). Use `skip` to skip this.
embed_description: Please type the description of the embed. Use `skip` to skip this.
embed_field: You are now adding another field. Please use the following format: `"Title" "Value"`. You can type `done` to complete the embed.
embed_image: Please provide the URL for the image you would like to display. Use `skip` to skip this.
embed_replace: Should this embed replace any existing message in that channel? If yes, type the message ID, otherwise type anything else.
